item.title: New Container: Kavita
item.description: We have released a new container for Kavita! Kavita is a fast, feature rich, cross platform reading server. Built with a focus for being a full solution for all your reading needs. Setup your own server and share your reading collection with your friends and family!
item.content:
We have released a new container for Kavita!

Kavita is a fast, feature rich, cross platform reading server. Built with a focus for being a full solution for all your reading needs. Setup your own server and share your reading collection with your friends and family!
